content: cozy ribbed neckwarmer tracy young materials size one size yarn 100g of lang yarns luna chunky weight 90% finished measurements alpaca / 10% nylon 120m / 131yds per 50g ball or circumference 46cm / 18 any chunky weight equivalent height 27cm / 11 needles 6 5mm / us 10 5 - 16 circular and dpns gauge 16 sts = 4 in 2x2 rib pattern unblocked notions 1 stitch marker tapestry needle cozy ribbed neckwarmer 1 of 2 © handknit yarn studio 2019 pattern using the long-tail method cast on 84 sts row 1 rs * knit 2 purl 2 repeat * to end of row row 2 ws * knit 2 purl 2 repeat * to end of row repeat row 1 and 2 until your work measures about 10cm / 4 ending with a rs instead of turning your work we will now join the stitches to knit in the round on the right side only place a stitch marker on the needle after the stitch just worked then knit into the first stitch of the same row by bringing your stitches all the way around the needles so that the stitches meet maintain 2x2 rib stitch pattern as follows every round * knit 2 purl 2 repeat * to end of round continue in pattern until entire work measures 27cm / 11 or to desired length bind off loosely in pattern using a loose bind off method or bind off in pattern using a needle 2 sizes larger us 13 / 9mm to achieve a loose bind off finishing weave in ends block if desired cozy ribbed neckwarmer 2 of 2 © handknit yarn studio 2019
